info.name: KB API - Sandbox - API Business suite
info.description:
More info about service [API Business suite | Komerƒçn√≠ banka (kb.cz)](https://www.kb.cz/cs/kbapi/sluzby-kb-api/api-business-suite)

General info [www.kb.cz/api](http://www.kb.cz/api)

## üîñ **How to use this template**

#### **Step 1: Send requests**

RESTful APIs allow you to perform CRUD operations using the POST, GET, PUT, and DELETE HTTP methods.

This collection contains each of these request types. Open each request and click "Send" to see what happens.

#### **Step 2: Update the variable**

Variables enable you to store and reuse values in Postman.

We have created a variables called

- `apiKeyClientIdentity`, API: Client Registration Sandbox¬†
    
- `apiKeyOAuth2`, API: Oauth2 Sandbox
    
- `apiKeyAdaa`, API: Account direct access Sandbox
    

Replace it with your apiKey from API Portal at [https://developers.kb.cz](https://developers.kb.cz).

item.name: API to register new software v2

header.description:
Correlation ID (GUID 128-bit: 8-4-4-4-12) is the generated unique identifier of the initial request, which stays the same through all the systems/application involved.

This value is automatically generated for every request. To use user-defined correlation ID, replace variable {{v4uuid}} with actual value.

response.name: SoftwareStatement in form of JWT created.
